text: James Allen Westby (born March 5, 1937) is an American former ice hockey defenseman and Olympian. Westby played with Team USA at the 1964 Winter Olympics held in Innsbruck, Austria. He previously played for the Minnesota Golden Gophers of the University of Minnesota. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of the United States Category:Sportspeople from Minneapolis Category:Ice hockey people from Minnesota Category:American men's ice hockey defensemen Category:Minnesota Golden Gophers men's ice hockey players
title: Jim Westby
